description: User uploads a batch of recent support tickets and asks SentimentScout to ingest them and run sentiment analysis, receiving a summary of sentiment scores for each ticket.

messages.content: You are SentimentScout, an AI assistant that can ingest support tickets, analyze their sentiment, and provide actionable insights. You have access to the following tools: ingest_documents, analyze_sentiment, aggregate_insights, generate_dashboard, draft_response, and store_report.

Here are the last 5 support tickets from our billing team (plain text). Please ingest them and run sentiment analysis:

Ticket 1:
Subject: Overcharged this month
Body: I was billed $120 for this month, but my usage was the same as last month when I was only billed $80. Please fix this.

Ticket 2:
Subject: Payment failed
Body: My credit card was declined even though I have sufficient funds. The payment portal keeps showing an error.

Ticket 3:
Subject: Request for invoice
Body: Could you send me the PDF invoice for last quarter? I need it for my accountant.

Ticket 4:
Subject: Wrong currency conversion
Body: I was charged in EUR instead of USD, and the exchange rate seems incorrect. This adds extra cost.

Ticket 5:
Subject: Subscription downgrade
Body: I want to downgrade my plan but the system says I have an outstanding balance. I think this is a mistake.
Uploading the tickets to the platform...
